speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0088/2007 ) by Mr Martin, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on the motion for a European Parliament resolution on the EU’s Aid for Trade ( 2006/2236(INI) .
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0088/2007 ) by Mr Martin, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on the motion for a European Parliament resolution on the EU’s Aid for Trade ( 2006/2236(INI) .
